data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
If you always face forward, you get the feeling that you are always facing forward. The following instructions will take you from forward to backward. So, the answer is no.

If you turn around in 4 steps you would have been back at the starting point. So, the answer is yes.

Turn left and take 5 steps. Thus, the answer is Yes.
